text: Hello everyone! i am wondering if there is any way to use a round robin scheduler via API? as in getting all available timeslots and also creating a meeting in the calender for one of the Sales persons connected to the round robin roster. I want to develop a meeting booking app that assigns customers to one random sales person from a pool of sales people. i hope my question and use case is clear. Thank you!
<@U25PYL3Q8> Thanks for the testing. I'll keep this in mind.

Hello peers,

I am having issue with the chatflow created on HubSpot using mobile SDK. When incorporated this config settings on flutter application (native iOS, android) these config are loaded in proper, but for launching this chatflow within the application on mobile devices is failing. Can anyone help in this scenario?
